description: The file is an HTML source for a web-based database viewer interface, featuring HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for browsing and displaying database tables and data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays list of databases.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database's table list.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data of a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display data table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell contents, handling objects and long text.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for detailed view.
